channel.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
channel.description: If anyone wants to play some black ops with me my gamertag is: BrentonT Aiming for 3rd prestige tonight so I'll be doing a marathon.

The graphics is too HD and theres no quickscope etc etc.

item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I use Black Ops to fill the emptyness that Modern Warfare 2 cannot. I am a competitive quick scoper (never lost a match yet) and every game I play on Modern Warfare 2 is with the Intervention, so I use Black Ops to do what I can’t do on Mw2, that is use machine guns. You can say Black Ops is my hoe

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:389221”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=485129.msg3554880#msg3554880 date=1301800292]

The only reason why it sucks is because its boring after a couple of games. There updates and overall features etc are amazing and a whole lot better than any other cod.

It’s by far the worst cod yet…

Im just loling at you.
[/quote]
Why? There’s not one good map, 3 highly overpowered guns, and every other gun is worthless, completely retarded kill streaks (not saying the nuke was much better), knifing is still horribly retarded, I could go on and on…[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:22, topic:389221”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=485129.msg3554890#msg3554890 date=1301800562]
Why? There’s not one good map, 3 highly overpowered guns, and every other gun is worthless, completely retarded kill streaks (not saying the nuke was much better), knifing is still horribly retarded, I could go on and on…
[/quote]

Yup, I can vouch for this and add that the ballistic knife pretty much brings Commando back without having to equip it as a perk.

RC-XD isn’t nearly as bad though since it was nerfed. If you have Flak Jacket and an RC-XD runs into your legs and blows up, it barely takes 50% of your health, if that.

It would also be a lot more fun if Ghost wasn’t used by every player in the world.[/quote]
When I did decide to play, scavenger all the way Nothing more fun than spraying the fuck out of someone and completely refilling your ammo from their dead corpse.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

m.dog311:

Why? There’s not one good map, 3 highly overpowered guns, and every other gun is worthless, completely retarded kill streaks (not saying the nuke was much better), knifing is still horribly retarded, I could go on and on…

Yup, I can vouch for this and add that the ballistic knife pretty much brings Commando back without having to equip it as a perk.

RC-XD isn’t nearly as bad though since it was nerfed. If you have Flak Jacket and an RC-XD runs into your legs and blows up, it barely takes 50% of your health, if that.

It would also be a lot more fun if Ghost wasn’t used by every player in the world.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:18, topic:389221”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=485129.msg3554880#msg3554880 date=1301800292]
Single player on rdr took me a while, really enjoyable too.
Iv played a little bit of multiplayer, i honestly do not like it. I think its because of the weapons and HP.
[/quote]

HP is a bit high but aim for the head and they’re killed in 1 or 2 shots with practically any weapon.[/quote]
Bolt action + headshot = instant death FTW. Got it golden like 2 days after i bought the game (no-lifed, and sadly the 5th game i had ever bought for xbox)

Read full topic

item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

CoonHunter:

I did buy the undead nightmare pack, but it really only grabbed me for like 3 days tbh. Although, I really should get back on and show them noobs what a golden gun is really about lol.

The campaign for Undead Nightmare was a bit repetitive but it was fun. It could have been longer though. The game can easily get boring when you play it by yourself. When I play I have anywhere from 2-4 friends+ join me in a posse.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:14, topic:389221”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=485129.msg3554803#msg3554803 date=1301797358]
People are still playing that? I stopped like 2 days after i maxed out.
[/quote]

Yeah, there’s a decent number of people on almost any game-type and Undead Nightmare rejuvenated some of the old players. It’s good fun when you get a lot of friends with RDR, get into a posse, and just do free roam or something. Undead Overrun is much more fun/difficult than CoD Zombies, imo. (In most situations).[/quote]
I did buy the undead nightmare pack, but it really only grabbed me for like 3 days tbh. Although, I really should get back on and show them noobs what a golden gun is really about lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

CoonHunter:

People are still playing that? I stopped like 2 days after i maxed out.

Yeah, there’s a decent number of people on almost any game-type and Undead Nightmare rejuvenated some of the old players. It’s good fun when you get a lot of friends with RDR, get into a posse, and just do free roam or something. Undead Overrun is much more fun/difficult than CoD Zombies, imo. (In most situations).

If you don’t know what Undead Overrun is, here. (Even though these people are really bad):

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F-iBdvi8uQY

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Think I’m done with the whole call of duty series, and I’ve played since cod2. Tbh everything they’ve put out lately has been essentially the same game over and over again. Same engine, style of gameplay and controls (I’ll give them credit though, the controls work very well). Just funny to laugh at the people who have spent $180 over cod’s after cod4 and complained about every single one and never play them anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:389221”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=485129.msg3554787#msg3554787 date=1301796971]
Made it to level 50. Stopped playing for about a month, prestiged and got to level 20 or something, and now its in my closet. I usually play RDR, MW2 (only because a lot of my friends still play it), MLB 2k11/Madden 11.
[/quote]

I would have never made it that far if it wasn’t for friends playing with me. Now all of those same friends have moved to RDR. :)[/quote]
People are still playing that? I stopped like 2 days after i maxed out.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Yea, it seems that friends are all that keep these games interesting. All combat games are near identical now, with the exception of a few mechanics tweaks. They all quickly get boring as hell playing by yourself.

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

m.dog311:

Made it to level 50. Stopped playing for about a month, prestiged and got to level 20 or something, and now its in my closet. I usually play RDR, MW2 (only because a lot of my friends still play it), MLB 2k11/Madden 11.

I would have never made it that far if it wasn’t for friends playing with me. Now all of those same friends have moved to RDR.

item.title: Anyone up for some BlackOps Multiplayer? XBOX360
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:389221”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=485129.msg3554665#msg3554665 date=1301790891]
Sadly, I went to the midnight release for this game. It is currently sitting somewhere in my closet gathering dust because it sucks so bad.
[/quote]

Made it to level 50. Stopped playing for about a month, prestiged and got to level 20 or something, and now its in my closet. I usually play RDR, MW2 (only because a lot of my friends still play it), MLB 2k11/Madden 11.
